attributes.action: Make the spaying/neutering of cats compulsory
attributes.additional_details: The cat population is out of control with shelters being full. Abandoned/stray cats are suffering while struggling to survive on the streets. There are health risks for cats that are not neutered/spayed such as cancer. Intact male cats will wander for miles to find a female on heat and fight with other males which causes injury and can lead to infection.
attributes.background: The spaying / neutering of cats should be compulsory.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643251
